duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage technical projects for product and process problem-solving, cost reduction, and profitability improvement.
Provide technical assistance to achieve the mill’s goals and drive continuous process improvement.
Implement process changes to improve operating efficiency and performance.
Analyze production output, contribute factors, and provide analytical support and problem-solving.
Coordinate and manage raw material and other process trials to drive process improvement.
Track and analyze data to inform recommendations and decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Chemical Engineering or related field
